Key Match Events: Sam Hilliard tied the score with a two-run homer in the ninth inning
Brenton Doyle delivered a game-winning single in the 10th
Post-Match Reflections: Cubs manager Craig Counsell praised Hilliard for his clutch performance
Rockies manager Bud Black expressed confidence in Senzatela's return after Tommy John surgery
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into extra innings with the Rockies ultimately winning 6-5
The Cubs are six games behind the Braves and Mets for the third NL wild card
Others: Justin Steele could be on the verge of rejoining the Cubs' rotation after a strong bullpen session
Antonio Senzatela is scheduled to be reinstated from the 60-day injured list to start Monday night against Arizona
